##16.2
Find all the errors in the following Bugs model:
```r
model { Bugs code
  for (i in 1:n){
    y[i] ~ dnorm (a[state[i]] + theta*treat[i] + b*hispanic, tau.y)
  }
  theta ~ dnorm (0, .0001)
  b ~ dnorm (0, 1000)
  for (j in 1:J){
    a[j] ~ rnorm (mu.a, tau.a^2)
  }
  mu.a ~ dnorm (0, .0001)
  tau.a <- pow (sigma.a, -2)
  sigma.a ~ dunif (0, 100)
  tau.y <- pow (sigma.y, -2)
  sigma.y <- dunif (0, 100)
}
```
